verses.text: OKU ou tāngaki hoku mata ki he ‘Afiona, ‘A koe ‘oku ‘afio ‘i langi na.

Vakai, hangē ‘oku hanga ‘a e mata ‘o e kau tamaio‘eiki ki he nima ‘o honau ‘eiki, Mo e mata ‘o e kaunanga ki he nima ‘o hono fine‘eiki; Pehē ‘a e hanga hotau mata kia Sihova ko hotau ‘Otua ni, Kae‘oua ke ne ‘ofa mai.
‘Ofa mai, ‘Eiki, ‘ofa mai: He kuo mau mākona fau ‘i he manuki.
‘Oku fu‘u mākona fau homau laumālie ‘I he luma ‘a e kakai nofo fiemālie, ‘A e manuki ‘a e kau fie‘eiki pē.
